sections.heading: Overview
content:
Ed Sussman, a freelance writer based in West Palm Beach, has
covered medical issues for more than 15 years and has been a journalist for
more than 35 years, including work on daily and weekly newspapers. He
contributes to more than 40 health-related publications and is the author of
three books. The latest is "Multiple Sclerosis," published in 1999 by
Enslow Publishers.
© 2005 - 2026 WebMD LLC, an Internet Brands company. All rights reserved. WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. See additional information.
